title: What is the name of the empty school on highway 210 just outside the village of Currie in Pender County? Apparently it has a history.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question about the
school outside of Currie on N.C. 210. I apologize for it taking almost
a year to get back to you.



I hope to publish a photo of the school in a few days.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12492
